[Home](./index.md) &gt; [vm-providers](./vm-providers.md) &gt; [CalibrationQRCodesConfig](./vm-providers.calibrationqrcodesconfig.md)

## CalibrationQRCodesConfig interface

Configuration used when [generating](./vm-providers.calibrationqrcodesgenerate.md) or [scanning](./vm-providers.calibrationqrcodesgenerate.md) a calibration image.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CalibrationQRCodesConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [contentPrefix?](./vm-providers.calibrationqrcodesconfig.contentprefix.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Prefix of the text to encode in the QR codes, before the position. Defaults to <code>viewport://</code>. Changing its value can be useful to distinguish multiple calibration images that are displayed in the same full image. |
|  [innerMargin?](./vm-providers.calibrationqrcodesconfig.innermargin.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Margin in pixels between two QR codes, both horizontally and vertically. Defaults to 50 times the scale. |
|  [outerMargin?](./vm-providers.calibrationqrcodesconfig.outermargin.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Horizontal (and vertical) margin in pixels between the left (or the top) of the image and the left (or the top) of the first QR code. Defaults to 10. |
|  [scale?](./vm-providers.calibrationqrcodesconfig.scale.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Scale of the QR codes, must be an integer. Defaults to 1. |
